AFTER:
n, device = x.shape[1], x.device

        x = self.token_emb(x)

        for attn, ff in self.layers:
            x = attn(x) + x
            x = ff(x) + x

        pos_emb = self.pos_emb(torch.arange(n, device = device))
        x = x + rearrange(pos_emb, 'n d -> () n d')

        return self.to_logits(x)
